name: Smartwool Non-Binding Pressure Free Basic Crew Socks - Women's
categories: Non-Binding Pressure Free Basic Crew Socks
description: Stripe up your life. These socks use merino wool to naturally regulate temperature and let your feet breathe. The non-binding cuffs add comfort under boots or skinny pants.Non-binding cuff won't indent or constrict your calves.Shred Shield technology reduces wear from the toes.Virtually Seamless™ toe eliminates chafing and hot spots.Narrower profile suits those with narrower feet.
